description: This is the entry point for a React web application. It imports the React library, ReactDOM for DOM rendering, a CSS stylesheet, and the main App component. It then creates a root element and renders the App component within React.StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: React.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM at the specified root.
